case_input_data_root.description:
Path to a case's input data root directory. The input
      data file structure and naming should follow the standards specified in
      https://svn-ccsm-inputdata.cgd.ucar.edu/trunk/inputdata/.

case_atm_forcing.description:
Path to the directory containing a case's atmospheric
      forcing NetCDF files, i.e, climate input data. The default is single-point
      forcing derived from the GSWP3 data set.

CLM_5.0_FATES.description:
CLM version 5.0, using the Functionally Assembled Ecosystem
        Simulator (FATES) to model demographic vegetation dynamics.

CLM_5.0_SP.description:
CLM version 5.0, using MODIS satellite measurements
        (SP = satellite phenology) to prescribe vegetation properties.

CLM_5.0_BGC.description:
CLM version 5.0, using Biogeochemistry (BGC) mode to
        model carbon and nitrogen dynamics.
